thread.title: Novak Djokovic’s Elbow Is Still Hurting

author: Tom Perrotta
title: Novak Djokovic’s Elbow Is Still Hurting
text:
For Novak Djokovic, the Australian Open had the worst possible ending: His right elbow still hurts and he doesn’t know how to cure it.
Djokovic was beaten on Monday by Hyeon Chung, a 21-year-old with loads of talent. But Chung’s straight-set victory—7-6(4), 7-5, 7-6(3)—had more to do with Djokovic’s pain in his elbow. Djokovic said it started early in the match and got worse.
“End... To Read the Full Story Subscribe Sign In
